page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE
page.content: On Sundays my family wake up at 8.30a.m.We all have breakfast together which is usually cereal,toast and a cup of tea.My mother then puts the dirty washing in the machine and we all get ready to go to visit my grandparents.My family include my mum, my dad,my two brothers and myself.We come back from my grandparents at 11.30a.m. so my mother can make Sunday dinner.My favourite is beef,potatoes,carrots,cabbage and gravy with syrup sponge for pudding. After dinner I might play with my computer,radio-controlled car or my B.M.X. bicycle.At 5 o'clock we have Sunday tea:sausage rolls and cakes, then we're allowed to play until 8.00.p.m. We have a bath and the whole family watch "That's Life" on T.V..At 10.30. I go to bed and read comics before finally going to sleep.
